front.title: Scenarios and Considerations of IPv6 in IEEE 802.16 Networks

abstract.t: As the deployment of IEEE 802.16 networks progresses, IPv6 will beintroduced in IEEE 802.16 networks. The characteristics of IEEE802.16 networks put special considerations on how IPv6 is used. Thisdocument describes scenarios and considerations on IPv6 adoption inIEEE 802.16 networks.
